name: Indignation: Timeless: Connecting The Past To The Present
detailed_description: With director James Schamus and stars Logan Lerman and Sarah Gadon, we explore the themes of the film: Anti-Semitism, sexual repression and fear set against the backdrop of war, and how these ideas are still relevant today.
